titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to improve the process for congressional consideration of international social security agreements.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8064)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
6/20/2007--Introduced.
Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to revise the process for congressional consideration of international social security agreements.
